statements.select: SELECT cd.[def_id] ,cd.[name] ,cd.[title] ,cd.[desc] AS def_desc ,cdv.def_ver_id ,cdv.value AS [version] ,cdv.[desc] AS def_ver_desc FROM [cfg_definition] cd LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_definition_version cdv ON cdv.def_id = cd.def_id
SELECT cd.[def_id] ,cd.[name] ,cd.[title] ,cd.[desc] AS def_desc FROM [cfg_definition] cd WHERE cd.[def_id] = #value#

SELECT cd.[def_id] ,cd.[name] ,cd.[title] ,cd.[desc] AS def_desc ,cdv.def_ver_id ,cdv.value AS [version] ,cdv.[desc] AS def_ver_desc FROM dbo.cfg_definition_version cdv INNER JOIN [cfg_definition] cd ON cdv.def_id = cd.def_id WHERE cdv.def_ver_id = #value#
SELECT ce.[env_id] ,ce.[name] ,ce.[key] ,ce.[desc] FROM [cfg_environment] ce WHERE ce.[env_id] = #value#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[item_type] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cvei.item_ver_env_val_id desc) AS rowNumber FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci LEFT JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE ci.item_type = 1
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'
)AS T1 WHERE rowNumber between $StartIndex$ and $EndIndex$

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[item_type] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cvei.item_ver_env_val_id desc) AS rowNumber FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci LEFT JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE ci.item_type = 1
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'
) AS T1
SELECT ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[desc] as item_desc FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci WHERE ci.[item_id] = #value#

SELECT ci.item_id ,ci.[key] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.[item_ver_id] ,cvi.ver as [version] ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc FROM [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_item] ci ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id WHERE cvi.[item_ver_id] = #value#

SELECT ci.item_id ,ci.[key] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.[item_ver_id] ,cvi.[item_id] ,cvi.[ver] as [version] ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc FROM [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_item] ci ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id WHERE cvi.item_id = #value#

SELECT ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci LEFT JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE cvei.item_ver_env_val_id = #value#
statements.delete:
DELETE dbo.cfg_version_environment_item WHERE item_ver_id IN (SELECT item_ver_id FROM dbo.cfg_version_item WHERE item_id IN(SELECT item_id FROM dbo.cfg_item WHERE item_id IN(#[]#)))
DELETE dbo.cfg_version_item WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM dbo.cfg_item WHERE item_id IN(#[]#))
DELETE dbo.cfg_item WHERE item_id IN(#[]#)

DELETE dbo.cfg_version_environment_item WHERE item_ver_id IN (#[]#)
DELETE dbo.cfg_version_item WHERE item_ver_id IN (#[]#)

DELETE dbo.cfg_definition_item WHERE def_ver_id IN(SELECT def_ver_id FROM dbo.cfg_definition_version WHERE def_id = #value#)
DELETE dbo.cfg_version_environment_item WHERE item_ver_id IN (SELECT item_ver_id FROM dbo.cfg_version_item WHERE item_id IN(SELECT item_id FROM dbo.cfg_item WHERE def_id = #value#))
DELETE dbo.cfg_version_item WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM dbo.cfg_item WHERE def_id = #value#)
DELETE dbo.cfg_item WHERE def_id = #value#
DELETE dbo.cfg_definition_version WHERE def_id = #value#
DELETE [dbo].[cfg_definition] WHERE def_id = #value#

DELETE dbo.cfg_definition_item WHERE def_ver_id = #value#
DELETE dbo.cfg_definition_version WHERE def_ver_id = #value#
statements.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT null as def_item_id ,ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[item_type] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY item_ver_env_val_id desc) AS rowNumber FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci LEFT JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE ci.item_type = 0 AND ci.def_id = #DefId#
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'
) AS t1 WHERE rowNumber between $StartIndex$ and $EndIndex$

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci LEFT JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE ci.item_type = 0 AND ci.def_id = #DefId#
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cdi.id as def_item_id ,ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[item_type] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cdi.id desc) AS rowNumber FROM cfg_definition_item cdi INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_env_val_id = cdi.item_ver_env_val_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_item] ci ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE cdi.def_ver_id = #DefVerId#
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'
) AS t1 WHERE rowNumber between $StartIndex$ and $EndIndex$

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cfg_definition_item cdi INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_env_val_id = cdi.item_ver_env_val_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_item] ci ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE cdi.def_ver_id = #DefVerId#
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY item_ver_env_val_id desc) AS rowNumber FROM ( SELECT ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[item_type] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE ci.item_type = 0 AND ci.def_id = #DefId#
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'
UNION ALL
SELECT ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[item_type] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE ci.item_type = 1
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'
) AS t1 ) AS t2 WHERE rowNumber between $StartIndex$ and $EndIndex$

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[item_type] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE ci.item_type = 0 AND ci.def_id = #DefId#
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'
UNION ALL
SELECT ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[item_type] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key FROM [dbo].[cfg_item] ci INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE ci.item_type = 1
ci.[key] like '%' + #Key# + '%'
cvi.ver like '%' + #Version# + '%'
ce.name like '%' + #EnvName# + '%'
) AS t1

SELECT cdi.id as def_item_id ,ci.[item_id] ,ci.[key] ,ci.[item_type] ,ci.[desc] AS item_desc ,cvi.ver AS [version] ,cvi.item_ver_id ,cvi.[desc] AS item_ver_desc ,cvei.item_ver_env_val_id ,cvei.value ,cvei.[desc] AS item_ver_env_val_desc ,ce.env_id ,ce.name AS env_name ,ce.[key] AS env_key ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cdi.id desc) AS rowNumber FROM cfg_definition_item cdi INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_version_environment_item cvei ON cvei.item_ver_env_val_id = cdi.item_ver_env_val_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_version_item] cvi ON cvei.item_ver_id = cvi.item_ver_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[cfg_item] ci ON ci.item_id = cvi.item_id INNER JOIN dbo.cfg_environment ce ON ce.env_id = cvei.env_id WHERE cdi.def_ver_id = #value#
